import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Noticia } from '../../models/noticia.model'; import { NoticiaService } from '../../services/noticia.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-noticias', templateUrl: './noticias.component.html', styleUrls: ['./noticias.component.css'] }) export class NoticiasComponent implements OnInit { noticias: Noticia[]; constructor( private noticiaService: NoticiaService ) { this.noticias = [] } public async ngOnInit(): Promise { await this.buscarNoticias(); } public async buscarNoticias(): Promise { this.noticias = (await this.noticiaService.getNoticias().toPromise())!; } }
